alert.note: Alert for Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 9:43AM MDT until further notice by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Montana... Milk River at Glasgow affecting Valley County. .Warm temperatures will melt the existing snowpack, leading to increased runoff and river flows. Ice jams have been reported upstream on the Milk, which could lead to rapid river level changes. For the Milk River...including Saco, Tampico, Dodson, Glasgow, Nashua...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Milk River at Glasgow. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Flooding will begin to affect buildings between the Fort Peck Highway and the Milk River east of Glasgow. Sullivan Park will be totally covered by flood waters. At 32.8 feet, Most roads in the lower Milk River Valley are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 31.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM MDT Sunday was 31.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 32.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then hover mostly between 31.0 and 32.0 feet through the middle of next week. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 32.0 feet on 10/06/1986. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 945 PM MDT.
